short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks the YES Network web player's 'Facts and Polls' popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the viewing experience on the YES Network's online streaming platform by automatically dismissing the recurring popup that asks viewers if they wish to see facts and polls during the game. This popup often obstructs the viewing area and overlaps with video controls, making it difficult to close. By removing this annoyance, viewers can enjoy an uninterrupted and cleaner viewing experience.
